{@i Marrion swatted at her ear. The sound was quite persistent.}

{@i Marrion stopped and looked around. This time, she could swear she was hearing voices in her head. Something caught her eye: what had looked like a fallen wasp's nest in the undergrowth, the assumed source of her irritation. {@i "Ooh!" said the voice, to a corresponding chorus of buzzing from inside the humanoid nest, "a real dwarven stinger! That's new. I really like your helmet, too. Where did you get it? Was it far away? Can I come too?"}
